task.summary: Default task
Added skeleton activity for the entry screen.
Added skeleton FragmentActivity containing navigation side bar to join between different fragment pages.
Enter button links from EnterActivity to MainActivity when clicked
Added first fragment and code necessary to make the navigation slider display the fragment.
Began to add more fragments to the navigation slider menu. Now contains Overview, Report, Budget and Transaction fragments which can be displayed in the activity.
- Finished entering fragment screens and linking to the navigation slider menu. - Changed a few design issues.
Added Account class for account objects in the SQLite database
Implemented SQLiteHelper class to help with creating, updating, deleting and viewing the Account database.
- Added Account activity to manage accounts - Account activity reads from database and then passes account id to the main activity.
- Changed Account object to be serializable so that it can be passed between Activities.

- Added new account activity for creating new accounts. - Added an Add button to link between AccountsActivity and NewAccountActivity - Added functionality to hold down and remove an account on AccountsActivity listView.
Fixed bug where account list contains multiple of the same account when back button is pressed from an activity ahead of the account list.
Implemented Transaction table and operations.
Fixed bug where cancel button or back button caused application to crash when on the NewAccountActivity
Fixed bug where deleting an account was not completely removing the account from the activity
- Added validation for overdraft and balance calculations. - Added the option for the user to enter minus values for the balance field
Added attribute to Transaction object
Removed unnecessary menu.xml files for fragments
- Implemented new fields for Transaction objects - Implemented a Tab host on the history fragment - Created tabs containing listviews which display income and expenses saved in the transaction table
- Implemented new Transactions fragment functionality - Added some validation to the form - Lists on history tabs are correctly displayed
- Implemented delete transaction functionality - Fixed bug where incorrect items in the list were being removed
- Implemented transaction activity to view information about transactions when clicked on historyFragments list view - Fixed few other bugs
- Fixed bug where balance was not actually updated in the database
Fixed bug where going back to the Accounts page wasnt refreshing the databases
- History fragment now only displays transactions for the current account
- Transactions for accounts that are about to be deleted are also deleted to stop database filled with unlinked transactions
- After completing a new transaction form, the fields not are cleared upon confirmation
- Fixed bug where listitems in the income tab were not clickable unless tabs had been changed since loading the activity
Fixed bug where balance doesn't change when a transaction is deleted
Implemented initial spinner box for category choice on a new transaction
implementing budget database and encryption
Adding joda time library
Small change

- Major refactor of functionality. - Application no longer stores accounts, now calculates from academic year dates instead - calculates all the values on the fly depending on the current date compared to the end of the semester. - Transaction date now defauls to todays date
- fixed small bug with default date

- Implemented IncomeFragment which will allow the user to change their income values which will then be updated. - implemented Expense fragment which will allow the user to change their expense values which will then be updated

- Fixed bug where if date was under 10th of the month it wouldnt add the 0 infront therefore breaking validation - Refactored income and expense fragments using FragmentUtilities class containing static methods

- Implemented DatePickerDialog inside TransactionFragment to make the date easier for the user to select - Fixed few bugs regarding date formats - Refactored some code into a FragmentUtilities class using static functions instead
- Refactored classes and packages. Moving old classes out and the replacement classes into their places
- Refactored all of the balance calculations into a BalanceUtilities class so that it can be used in the widget also.
- Widget not shows balance which is revalidated when the submit button is clicked FINALLY! IT WORKS! I HATE WIDGETS!
- Reworked widget to look nicer and include an image button which opens the app. - Setup all floats to be presented with 2 decimal places for use as currencies
- OverviewFragment now refreshes onResume() when the app is minimized and clicked again. - fixed bug where app didnt update immediately when the balance was changed via the widget
Year dates now only start from today
calculations for weekly values were slightly incorrect, seems to be fixed now
App now takes the users balance into account for their budget period, although presumes that it can factor all of their balance into their budget
- Implemented AChartEngine library to help with charts on the report page. - Chart is generated on the ReportFragment using transactions which have occured in the same month as today
- Implemented arrows to change the date for ReportFragment allowing the user to change what transactions are being displayed - Refreshed the piechart displaed when month changed
Fixed bug where category totals were being calculated incorrectly
- Refactored variables in most classes
- Implemented HistoryArrayAdapter for use with the HistoryFragment list of transactions - changed the ArrayAdapter in HistoryFragment to show more information for each transaction in the list
Items in the ListView of HistoryFragment now contain specific icons matching categories
- Sorted transactions on HistoryFragment's listview - Refactored some code into functions to make it easier to read
- Created own key for items so chart can show percentages. - Centered the items in the key - Colored the items in the key - Changed pallet of colors so more readable
- Fixed bug where legend did not refresh correctly when the date is changed on ReportFragment
- Fixed bug where a transaction can be added with amount 0

- Fixed bug where changing fixed expenses to empty string was causing a problem as it was attempting to make into a float. - Added new category "supermarket" and changes "booze" to now be "socialising". - Changed widget to only allow a 3 max spend. - Removed food from fixed income.

- Implemented Budget table to store the budgets - Implemented BudgetFragment, which allows the user to choose an amount of their budget they wish to set aside for a certain category - Killed billions of bugs - Fixed bugs with dates, now works out by the day and checks for start week or end week. - Added budget progress bars to the home screen. - Added remove functionality to the budgets on home screen.
Fixed bug with IncomeFragment calculations

MESSAGE.value: - fixed small bug with default date

- Implemented IncomeFragment which will allow the user to change their income values which will then be updated. - implemented Expense fragment which will allow the user to change their expense values which will then be updated

- Fixed bug where if date was under 10th of the month it wouldnt add the 0 infront therefore breaking validation - Refactored income and expense fragments using FragmentUtilities class containing static methods

- Implemented DatePickerDialog inside TransactionFragment to make the date easier for the user to select - Fixed few bugs regarding date formats - Refactored some code into a FragmentUtilities class using static functions instead
- Refactored classes and packages. Moving old classes out and the replacement classes into their places
- Refactored all of the balance calculations into a BalanceUtilities class so that it can be used in the widget also.
- Widget not shows balance which is revalidated when the submit button is clicked FINALLY! IT WORKS! I HATE WIDGETS!
- Reworked widget to look nicer and include an image button which opens the app. - Setup all floats to be presented with 2 decimal places for use as currencies
- OverviewFragment now refreshes onResume() when the app is minimized and clicked again. - fixed bug where app didnt update immediately when the balance was changed via the widget
Year dates now only start from today
calculations for weekly values were slightly incorrect, seems to be fixed now
App now takes the users balance into account for their budget period, although presumes that it can factor all of their balance into their budget
- Implemented AChartEngine library to help with charts on the report page. - Chart is generated on the ReportFragment using transactions which have occured in the same month as today
- Implemented arrows to change the date for ReportFragment allowing the user to change what transactions are being displayed - Refreshed the piechart displaed when month changed
Fixed bug where category totals were being calculated incorrectly
- Refactored variables in most classes
- Implemented HistoryArrayAdapter for use with the HistoryFragment list of transactions - changed the ArrayAdapter in HistoryFragment to show more information for each transaction in the list
Items in the ListView of HistoryFragment now contain specific icons matching categories
- Sorted transactions on HistoryFragment's listview - Refactored some code into functions to make it easier to read
- Created own key for items so chart can show percentages. - Centered the items in the key - Colored the items in the key - Changed pallet of colors so more readable
- Fixed bug where legend did not refresh correctly when the date is changed on ReportFragment
- Fixed bug where a transaction can be added with amount 0

- Fixed bug where changing fixed expenses to empty string was causing a problem as it was attempting to make into a float. - Added new category "supermarket" and changes "booze" to now be "socialising". - Changed widget to only allow a 3 max spend. - Removed food from fixed income.

- Implemented Budget table to store the budgets - Implemented BudgetFragment, which allows the user to choose an amount of their budget they wish to set aside for a certain category - Killed billions of bugs - Fixed bugs with dates, now works out by the day and checks for start week or end week. - Added budget progress bars to the home screen. - Added remove functionality to the budgets on home screen.
Fixed bug with IncomeFragment calculations
